headline: BRK.B Slips 2% in 3 Months, Trades at a Premium: How to Play the Stock
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's stock slides down 2.1% in three months, trades at a premium, and faces cautious sentiment despite long-term strength.

headline: Florida farmers now plowing over perfectly good tomatoes as Trump’s tariff policies cause prices to plummet
summary: Deportations, cheap imports eat into profits.
